title: Caroller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, sing at another player's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Your target will learn 3 names. 1 of which will be good and another one will be evil.

desc:
Post 4556
*Hark! how the bells, sweet silver bells All seem to say "Throw cares away."*
